SEARCH
Package wsp

Class Researcher<T>

java.lang.Object
wsp.Researcher<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of user associated with the researcher.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Researcher<T> extends Object implements Serializable
The Researcher class represents a researcher in the academic system. It provides functionalities for viewing papers, creating papers, viewing projects, viewing journals, and adding papers to a journal.
See Also:
